title: All-new Orange Stage 6 EVO is their 140mm travel sport-mode enduro bike
content:
Orange Bikes have given their Stage 6 enduro bike the EVO treatment, with an all-new custom-formed frame now delivering just 140mm of rear wheel travel via that instantly recognizable Orange single-pivot. The Stage 6 EVO doesn’t replace the Stage 6 – that 150mm travel bike remains in the line-up for those after the extra cushion.

The post All-new Orange Stage 6 EVO is their 140mm travel sport-mode enduro bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
